thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Catchmark Announces Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.12

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Catchmark Announces Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.12
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Catchmark Timber Trust Inc:
* CATCHMARK ANNOUNCES FULL-YEAR AND FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS, DECLARES FIRST QUARTER 2018 DIVIDEND
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 11 PERCENT TO $22.7 MILLION * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.12 * ‍FOR FULL-YEAR 2018, CATCHMARK PROJECTS A GAAP NET LOSS OF BETWEEN $12 MILLION AND $15 MILLION​
* ‍COMPANY ANTICIPATES ITS ADJUSTED EBITDA TO REGISTER BETWEEN $42 MILLION AND $48 MILLION FOR FY18​
* FY2017 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.33 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2017 REVENUE VIEW $91.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
